title: The Secret Agent
description: The story of Max, a taxi driver who becomes involved in a spy mission to recover a stolen computer chip.

page1.paragraph1: Max drives a taxi. He knows all city roads.
page1.paragraph2: Max likes his job. He talks to many people.
page1.paragraph3: One day, a man in a black suit gets in.
page1.paragraph5: The man looks at his phone. He looks worried.
page1.paragraph7: Max sees a black car behind them.
page1.paragraph9: Max drives very fast. The black car is gone.

page1.paragraph1: The man gives Max a card. 'Call me. I am Agent Tom.'
page1.paragraph2: Next day, Max calls. Tom asks, 'Can you help us?'
page1.paragraph3: Max goes to a big building. Many people work with computers.
page1.paragraph4: 'We need a driver,' Tom says. 'Someone took a special chip.'
page1.paragraph6: 'You drive well. You stay calm. You know all roads.'
page1.paragraph7: Max thinks. This is not safe.

page1.paragraph1: Tom shows Max a new car. It is black and fast.
page1.paragraph2: 'This car has special things,' Tom says. 'Push this for speed.'
page1.paragraph3: Max drives the car. It is very fast.
page1.paragraph4: 'The chip is in a red box,' Tom says. 'Bad men take it to the port.'
page1.paragraph6: 'Tonight,' Tom says. 'You drive. I get the box.'
page1.paragraph7: It starts to rain. Max feels scared but ready.

page1.paragraph1: Max and Tom wait near the port. They see three men with guns.
page1.paragraph2: 'There is the red box,' Tom says.
page1.paragraph3: Tom runs to get it. The men see him.
page1.paragraph4: 'Tom is in trouble,' Max thinks. 'I must help.'
page1.paragraph5: Max pushes the speed button. The car jumps forward.
page1.paragraph6: The men turn and point guns at Max.
page1.paragraph9: But a big truck blocks the road.

page1.paragraph1: Max sees a small path between buildings. No cars go there.
page1.paragraph3: Max turns the car. They drive on the small path.
page1.paragraph4: The bad men cannot follow. They shoot, but miss.
page1.paragraph6: They get to a safe place. Tom opens the red box.
page1.paragraph7: 'Wait. This is not the chip,' Tom says.
page1.paragraph8: Max looks. Inside is a note: 'Look at your taxi.'
page1.paragraph9: At home, Max finds the real chip in his taxi.
page1.paragraph10: The bad men planned this all along.
page1.paragraph11: Max is the real agent now.
